song.englishname: By All Accounts (Today Was A Disaster)

english.segment1: wasted, paralyzed. beneath ten thousand layers of disguise. built to save. what's left that has already worn away
english.segment2: inside the vacant made-up plastic life. only your heart survived. for one last cry. how long. must I always remember all that I won't forget. until it's my day to die. these broken animals. useless as they are
english.segment3: gravity gets to me. holds me here without release. now's the time to cut the line
english.segment4: cross my heart. i realize nights are long when hope is gone. God help me make it home (this time)
